description: <sight/holographic>  This one is in a rather sorry state due to suffering age-related structural issues with the lens.  While functional, it's hardly as effective as modern holographic sights.

variants.description: <sight/holographic>  The 553 is a legacy design, having been out of production for over a decade.  Like most 553s, this one is suffering from delamination, which noticably distorts its sight picture.  While usable in the most technical sense of the word, you should upgrade to a modern model as soon as possible.  It does, however, complement the early-2000s military-AR aesthetic nicely.   <variant:black>
